reviews.review: Great film with lots of big set pieces that are fun to watch. Great to see all of these characters from different part of the MCU to interact with each other.

A great flick with a lot of heart. Not perfect, but an amazing accomplishment for mashing up all these movies with such a big cast.

the biggest downfall of the movie is the ending holds no emotional weight, because we know it will be undone.
My affinity for Marvel comic hero movies continues -- Absolutely loved it!  Special effects, action, fast moving story -- see it on the BIG SCREEN, worth it!

It was a good movie, but I was disappointed, especially after seeing Captain America: Civil War and Thor: Ragnanok. Too many characters, vying for time. I know the ending sets up the next Infinity War movie, but I still hated. I hope the next movie adds more humor and less characters.
Amazing, can't wait for the next one!!
Amazing movie. It's full of action and amazing jokes. I 100% recommend it.
This is tied for my favorite Marvel movie along with Spiderman Homecoming
From a comic nerd’s standpoint, such a magnum opus of sorts of all it’s been built up to be! I laughed, I cried, and I was mesmerized by Drax’s invisibility!

I feel like marvel movies have had some pacing issues. This is no exception.  I can't blame them because there are a ton of characters and several major story lines.  Many things are just glossed over. 
*****spoilers!*****
Whoever approved the ending should be fired. For anyone that knows about the MCU, it's a dead giveaway for what's going to happen in the next movie. Obviously, all the people that disappeared are in the Soul Stone with Gamorra. They'll show up halfway through the next movie and find a way to get out. A MUCH better ending would have been a cliffhanger  that didn't rely on audience ignorance: just skip over the disappearing. The end would be Thanos snapping and Thor yelling "What did you just do?" then Thanos disappears and just the cut of him smiling. The audience would be left asking what happened. The next movie would start and all these people would be gone and we wouldn't know what happened. Just confusion and piecing it together through the movie.
